item.title: Hildegard Study Days Online via ICA
item.description:
Hildegard Study Days Online via International Chant Academy

In collaboration with the International Chant Academy in the USA, Marsja teaches online interactive sessions on the music of Hildegard von Bingen.

item.title: Francis and his Cantico del Sole

item.title: General Information
item.description:
General information theme workshops for enthusiasts, advanced and (pre-) professionals

item.title: Hildegard von Bingen
item.description:
Hildegard von Bingen:

An in-depth look at the songs of Hildegard von Bingen from the Dendermonde Codex and the Riesencodex

item.title: Tailor-made workshops
item.description:
Tailor-made workshops

Marsja Mudde Muziek provides customized workshops for all kinds of occasions and target groups.
